synopsis.text: June 1966 unfolds a fateful encounter between Shin Tsukishima and Yuno Kawazu on the sandy shores of Izu. Shin, on a quest to acquire a crystal radio, crosses paths with the tearful Yuno. As they navigate their journey guided by the mystical Book of Genesis, the lines separating three distinct realms begin to blur. This special episode, screened at Project Aquarion's 10th Anniversary event, marks the beginning of an extraordinary adventure that transcends worlds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
